Reviews.Title: “Much improved but there are better hotels for the money”
Reviews.Author: Jon39
Reviews.Content: Not stayed here for about five years. Used to be pretty run down so was pleasanty surprised that rooms and public areas have been significantly improved. However, the move upmarket (as reflected in the price) was not matched by the service. While the staff were friendly, service was slow and unreliable. Hotel was also overcrowded; forget breakfast in the main restaurant in the morning unless you like queuing and sharing a table with several strangers; while you could also get breakfast in the executive lounge, the food on offer was poor. Good location though A lot better than it was, but for this money I have stayed in much better places close by. Try the Royal Plaza on Scotts.

Reviews.Title: “Better than the rest”
Reviews.Author: tkhq
Reviews.Content: This is my second stay at this hotel. Notice the changes of staff and enviroment. Looks like there is a change of leadership. I was upgraded to family room as i have 4 kids without extra charges. That is very considerate and staffs were friendly esp choana at front desk. Family room was big and clean and xia zhen the room cleaner was jovial n helpful. My kids mess up the room n she cleaned the room with smile n play with my kids. My kids love her. Overall, we like this hotel and my kids asked to go back again.

Reviews.Title: “OPH”
Reviews.Author: Stephan S
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Orchard Parade Hotel for a lot of times for the reason of business trips to Singapore. It's located near the shopping area of Orchard Road, so it is very easy to find ways to regenerate and relax in the evening. Otherwise you can use the hotel's gym or pool for any kind of workout or just calm down at the pool's terace in the evening. The hotel's food is quite nice, the stuff is very friendly and the rooms are clean and comfortable. I would recommend this hotel to other potential guests.

Reviews.Title: “3 days in Singapore!”
Reviews.Author: divermariner
Reviews.Content: this hotel could be better. location is great, however got changed room twice after cleanliness was poor on both. hair in showers, evidence that toilets were not cleaned were the reason for changing rooms. internet is not reaching some rooms of the hotel and therefore affecting what could have been a better stay. restaurant is very good, breakfast buffet is excellent. service of personnel very good despite the facts mentioned above.

Reviews.Title: “Good location with poor service”
Reviews.Author: Nitinkachrani
Reviews.Content: The location is great but the overall experience in the hotel is not very comfortable.The house keeping is not that prompt.I was locked in the bathroom for 15 minutes till person came to rescue and opened the door.The poor quality of maintained lock,looking very old and not very well maintained.The front desk is less staffed and not responding properly.The tourist counter is always with no staff.The breakfast is absoluetly poor and not enough.There is nothing much for vegeterain.The serving staff is not at all helpful,they are good for spoiling your morning.Only positive is location.

Reviews.Title: “Good Place for Leisure and Comfort”
Reviews.Author: steph0402
Reviews.Content: Good value for your money. Very close to the shopping and business district of Singapore. Aside from that, the room is very comfortable, clean and big enough. staff are professional and friendly. although it would be much better if there is a doorman to assist you in getting cabs etc overall, a good place to stay

Reviews.Title: “GOOD PLACE TO STAY FOR BUSINESS TRIP”
Reviews.Author: rafael r
Reviews.Content: Hotel hospitality is very good. both lobby bar and the VIP salon at 17th floor, are good places to stay with very profesional and kind personnel, attending and willing to make a guest feeling like home. Mrs. Apple have been very profesional doing her job. all other personnel from managers, reception, maintenace, etc, have performed in the same profesional way. thanks.

Reviews.Title: “Incompetent Management”
Reviews.Author: DJ0266
Reviews.Content: When I checked out I paid my incidentals by cash. Three days later there was a charge on my credit card for more incidentals that were duplicates and some I believe were not even mine. I pointed it out to the managers via e-mail and they agreed to the over charges and asked me to review the statements for more over charges. I thought that was managements job!!! I finally got frustrated with them and realized they were incompetent so I told them to drop the matter and I would just take the S$100 loss. I was afraid if they tried to reimburse me they would screw things up worse than they were. Never once was there an apology or a 'you are the customer, you are right' attitude. They were always defensive and insisting they were right. I don't recommend using your credit card here. As far as the hotel, like all hotels in Singapore, the lobby is nice, but once you leave the elevator and walk through the maze of hallways to your room, you will probably be as disappointed as I was. The furniture is large and outdated which make your tiny little room feel even smaller. The cleaning staff was polite and friendly, but didn't change the linens daily. Overall, I think there are better prices and locations in Singapore where the management actually cares about the customer. I will never return to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Return Trip OK”
Reviews.Author: Donaldhackerdon
Reviews.Content: Stayed before. Won't say it's a great hotel, however service has gone up. Can do better with a door person. Breakfast at the pool or lobby would be appreciated as the second floor restaurant is average with ambience. Could not get into club as no rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Homw away from home”
Reviews.Author: Cess F
Reviews.Content: It's my first time to visit this hotel and I can tell it's really worth every penny. The room is very relaxing, a good choice for people who needs some time to rest. Staffs are really accommodating particularly FO Joanne who was very helpful in assisting us and providing our needs.

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: FoxtrotUk
Reviews.Content: Business trip, and not a patch on some of the better places in Sing, but it was value. Room a bit dingy, and as usual in the East check in takes ages! Good spot though, next to Coffee shops and good bars. Didnt eat in the hotel, but the bar was cozy. Spent a day round the pool, no on site service and had to ring down for a drink and food. Came pretty quickly though. Gym next to the outdoor pool was reasonable. Note, there is a very good wine shop by the Hotel lobby. Overall, good spot to be if you are not planning to be in the room and hotel for long periods.

Reviews.Title: “Our home in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: 215Jan
Reviews.Content: OPH is our favorite hotel in Singapore. The staff is very friendly and service-minded, from the bellboys to the top 17 floor club. Be careful to keep Josephine, who is outstanding and has become our most lovely friend. Jan and Monika

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, excellent service”
Reviews.Author: CBT4578
Reviews.Content: We frequently travel to Singapore on business, and have always been extremely happy and satisfied with the OPH. The rooms are clean and spacious, the service is excellent, and the location can't be beat. But it is the little things that make this hotel so special: The fact that our CEO can always be sure to get "his" room when he comes (if available of course), the friendly staff in the lounges who are willing to extend the closing time if necessary, or the general helpfulness of everybody, from the bellboys all the way to management. When we go to Singapore, we stay nowhere else. When we travel elsewhere, we measure all other hotels by this standard.

Reviews.Title: “nice people and nice hotel for family”
Reviews.Author: RichardleeHSBC
Reviews.Content: Great staff and great place to stay. The pool is nice the rooms are well maintained even though looks old. Overall, 5 thumps up.

Reviews.Title: “cozy and convenient”
Reviews.Author: usmanneil
Reviews.Content: Service was warm and friendly, rooms clean and comfortable, nice facilities. Only complaint is that we could not enjoy our breakfast at tung lok. Too crowded and noisy and we have to share table with others. Anyway, we do have a pleasant stay with orchard parade.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable Recovery”
Reviews.Author: Hotelier12
Reviews.Content: At first I was checked into a smoking room that was not aired or could not be aired. The rooms are so small that you can not even open the cupboard door fully and it opens up against the bed. When I requested a change in room I was first told I could be helped the next day only, this is without checking availability in the system. I insisted and short of causing an incident on the desk did I get a non smoking room. This room was better and housekeeping was fine. Breakfast was atrocious and I would be embarrassed if I was the F & B Manager in this hotel. The buffet was untidy, not well refreshed and waiter service was sloppy on the tables. The hotel's location was fine and we got around well within the city.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable & convenient place to stay in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Celiashaw
Reviews.Content: It is a nice concept of the lobby design, which is beside the bar. Especially under the sunshine, it makes us feel warm & brighten our mood. This is the first impression when we step in the area, & we love it so much. Although it is an old hotel, but the suit rooms are new and nice renovated. Thanks for the kindly arrangement. We appreciated the warm services that have been provided by the team of Apple, Jonathan & Coco @ suit lounge. It is a nice and convenient place to stay in Singapore. Highly recommend based on the kindly services that they are offering to customers. Pls keep it up ;P.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Steve G
Reviews.Content: Good location for all amenities. Stayed for 3 months at the hotel and was very impressed by the complete package. Staff were extremely helpful and friendly and management were always available for consultatation. Hotel areas and rooms were very clean and the housekeeping and laundry staff were very efficient. Great service in the club room where all the staff were very friendly and welcoming, I was made to feel like part of the family. Only minor fault I noted was the quality of the balcony windows and the soundproofing, but I soon became accustomed to it. Without doubt would stay again. stephengoudie@hotmail.com

Reviews.Title: “Had many happy return visits to "home away from home"”
Reviews.Author: Silverlucky
Reviews.Content: Have stayed at OPH for many years and have seen many improvements and changes made to this "Grand Dame" of Orchard Road. Because of the crowds of "mass tour groups" with loud noises checking in, and behaving badly (example, speaking into hand-phones while helping themselves with one hand at the buffet breakfast counters or while checking in, and Mainland Chinese people shouting to each other over the breakfast room.), I choose to pay extra for the Executive Club floors. The staff at the Club Lounge do know how to make one feel really "at home" with their friendly smiles, wonderful hospitability and great service. We really enjoyed our stay and return visit (latest return visit was in February 2012) , thanks very much to Ms. Eunice Choo, Ms. Josephine, Ms Apple, Jonathon, and the lovely lady from the Philippines (with the name I cannnot pronounce well). They made our stay a memorable one and we return again and again, to meet these "friends" of OPH. However, it would be appreciated if the Management makes sure that guests using the Club Lounge are (a) in fact Club paying guests, (b) observing a certain decent dress code (like, no surfer shorts, no singlets, no slippers) and no unruly behaviour, and to show their respect that this is a Club Lounge where Club guests can meet business associates; and (c) that Club staff have the authority to nicely "throw out" guests who are not suitably dressed or too "loud-mouthed" (speaking too loudly within the small space of the Lounge) so that other guests cannot read the newspapers or watch tv in the Lounge. Our most recent stay was in the Presidential Suite. Although it was a spacious suite, one can only watch tv from the bed (TV fixed in an unusual position), the colour of the big and long sofa does not match the whole suite (it dominates the room), and the electric water-cooker does not work because the electrical wiring was faulty (the electrician came and showed to us the electrical wires embeded in the wall that have corroded, which he could not fix in one day). Finally, please review breakfast offering in the Club Lounge. It serves Danish pastries and some limited items. In Europe, Danish pastries, especially the sweet ones, are not really a huge favourite amongst the health conscious folks. Because of the limited offering, I had to go down to level 2 to Tung Lok to "fight" with the group-tour people (a) for a seat, (b) for the food (they tend to pile up their plates with foods that they later leave half-eaten - what a waste !) - pity that the famous Tung Lok Restaurant foods are treated with such low respect. Despite all this, we return to OPH simply because the staff at Executive Club level treat us like "we are at home". Many thanks to Eunice, Josephine, Apple, Jonathon, "Miss Philippines" and staff behind the scene (like the Laundry department). Cheers, Dr, Gim Seow

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: ya_1980
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this hotel in March 2012. Pros - very good location, spacious comfortable room (I stayed in deluxe room), very nice pool area, very helpful and friendly staff (5 points!!!). Cons - bathrooms are definately in need of urgent!!! renovation.

Reviews.Title: “Will return again.”
Reviews.Author: Hot2000
Reviews.Content: Will return again, overall love it. I was impressed with the service provided by the staff in the club floor. Away from home for long, kinda misses but staying at the club floor, it let me feels warm and Welcoming. They did a excellent job. I would like to say thank you and appreciate their help.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay and excellent club service”
Reviews.Author: Avies1143
Reviews.Content: Excellent service, well management. Very warm and friendly approaches.

Reviews.Title: “A bit neglected”
Reviews.Author: Medobrunda
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel on few occasions during my business trips to Singapore, most recently from 06-09/02/2012. Whilst one has to admire its superb location(top of the Orchard Road), I couldn't help thinking that place requires a bit of a renovating, particularly this applies to the rooms/bathrooms etc. Some 5 years ago it was much better and looked more appealing to the business travelers. The restaurant menu has not changed for years, and it is somewhat limited(Modesto and Angus). I did not have a chance to visit new Chinese restaurant in the lobby. That said, it is not that I wouldn't stay there again, it is not THAT bad, it's only that it is getting a bit neglected.

Reviews.Title: “Good value great location”
Reviews.Author: Roadwarriorasia
Reviews.Content: Stayed on biz trip- rooms were spacious and had everything I needed. Staff were helpful and provided good service during my stay. Location is fantastic - shopping and entertainment on the doorstep. Pools was great too.

Reviews.Title: “Take the club rooms”
Reviews.Author: Flynnwales2
Reviews.Content: 20th visit and as always club room is well worth the money! Staff there are fantatic and so helpful. Had chest infection and they got me into a doctor straight away. Breakfast is simple but the full version is avalible downstairs.

Reviews.Title: “Good Location”
Reviews.Author: billywalton
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel a few times, from the porter at the door to the management, provide an excellent service. The rooms are bright, all with balconies, spacious, very very clean. As i travelled a lot on business, this is one of the better hotel I have stayed in. "I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone" Best wishes to all the staff in the hotel for the future.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic service”
Reviews.Author: ukguytemp
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very conveniently located at the quiet end of Orchard road. Everything a traveler needs is nearby; the local train system is a short walk away and buses run from a stop just over the road. Shopping centres are also very close.The pool is nice too. I have stayed here many times because its a great location and the staff are fantastic. Have not had such great service anywhere else in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Great services and people”
Reviews.Author: shirley0196
Reviews.Content: A porter opened the door, with a smile on his face and greet me! He assisted me the directions to the function room, able to provide informations which I need. I was here couple of years ago with a friend checking in to orchard parade, at that time, I don't see any excellent service from the staff. But now, all staff seems to be more alert and sensitive to the guests' needs. I hope the staff will keep up the good job.

Reviews.Title: “OK hotel, good location, horrible breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Scirocco-frk
Reviews.Content: Hotel is located at the beginning of the Orchard road, about 10 min walk from the Orchard metro station. Enough "entertainment" around the hotel. Most of the reviewers got it exactly right: it is an aging hotel due for remodeling 3 years ago. Room are ok, beds are ok. We did see quite a lot of ants in our room. (Maybe because it was the 3rd floor). We did not have any problems with noice. Wifi included. Staff was not bad (with exception of the breakfast room). Breakfast is the worst we have ever experienced. Dont bother. All in all not a bad experience for a 3 star hotel, do not expect more.

Reviews.Title: “HOTEL WITH GOOD LOCATION AND SERVICES”
Reviews.Author: Kita_Lin
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located in the centre of the city. It is very convenient for tourists to go to most of the places of interests from the hotel. It is also very close to orchard road where plenty of shopping malls are located. The staffs of the hotel are very friendly and helpful. Especially the girl Cella from front desk. She is patient and proactive when we had a inquiry. In a word, The hotel is value for money and a good choice for tourist to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Not great”
Reviews.Author: WTBManila
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in need of renovation. Rooms are tired. Bathroom poky and old. Breakfast was not what one would expect from a 4 star. It is however in a great location. I think they did give me a free upgrade, but not sure what the original room would have looked like as there was nothing but the basics in the room I had. There were also a number of issues with the bill at checkout. They were satisfactorily dealt with but would probably behoove you to double-check charges nonetheless.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: dowers
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here a couple of times. The location is really good- at the top of Orchard Road with plenty of restaurants and shopping close by. I would stay here again for sure.

Reviews.Title: “30 times at the OrchardParade!”
Reviews.Author: MrGeorgeSD
Reviews.Content: During the last 4 years I had really many Singapore-Trips and most of the times I have chosen the OHP! Why? In my opinion this hotel is best choice between price (keep in mind you stay at the Orchard Road in Singapore! You don´t get a good quality 4* hotel for 200$) and luxury (better to say:atmosphere). I like the pool at the 6th floor, the gym is ok, rooms are nice, but most important: you feel a bit like home: It is not a too-big anonymous 1000 beds-place - all the staff is friendly and you get a good service. Especially the club-floor is a nice place: not too big and you meet a lot of people you have met before there - and it is quite easy to get in contact to other hotel-guest there. The club-floor service-people are always friendly, helpful and funny! I am always looking forward to be there (next time in 4 days )

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Newark upon Trent, null, United Kingdom
Reviews.Title: “The great asian hospitality experience”
Reviews.Author: Mexbrit_12
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located at the beggining of the Orchard Road hotel zone, it has a mediterranean character to its architecture rather than the "tower look" of most of its neighbours. And unlike them most of its rooms possess a balcony, for the best view make sure to ask for an even number room on floor 7 or above where you can enjoy the view of the beautiful vegetation and the pool. The room was impeccably clean and very comfortable.But the best assett to this hotel is its staff, very friendly yet respectful and so helpful, service always with smiles I certainly felt among friends. There are many restaurants at the door step. And the shopping experience starts as soon as you step out of the hotel, the Ion Orchard is within 10 min walking distance. And the Botanical gardens 20 min walk away. I was fortunate to enjoy 3 weeks of stay at this hotel and be happy to return at any oportunity.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay, wonderful service in great location”
Reviews.Author: Hotbreak
Reviews.Content: This is my second stay and I felt that there are big changes in the service. Staff were more attentive and more forcused. The club floor had more staff and the service was great compared to before where there was a sign saying to call front office if you need assistance. The change in the embience was wonderful. Breakfast varity was there and again felt that the attention given was different to my previous stay. Good to see that the management has taken action with all the reviews they have been receiving. This hotel is one of the affordables hotel on the Orchard Road Belt and I had a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “Club service excellent”
Reviews.Author: diorlovey
Reviews.Content: Hearing from my local friends, that don't expect any pro service from orchard parade hotel as this is a local chain. Surprsingly, that is not the case. A guy who checked me in on the 17th floor, very nice, create small talk and very informative. I am impressed by his service as i checked into couple of 4 and 5 star hotels in Singapore, the staff weren't that friendly and attentive. Evening cocktail, the lounge were packed and the staff were running in and out, both were still wearing smile on their face. A lady in suit, i guess is the manager, she will walk towards guests and ensure they were attended and everything is good. I told my local friends that they were wrong. Of course, the room can't compare to other hotels because is kind of outdated and have to refurnish. Anyway, I will come back again and stay on the club floor. keep up the good job!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: leong82selangor
Reviews.Content: Good location, breakfast is good, pretty loads of variety for my family to choose. All staff are nice,welcoming and provides good service. They are lovely. We have 4 rooms, staff are considerate as they allocate rooms for us on the same floor. Rooms have to do some furnishing, other than that, everything are great. We will be back and surely recommend our friends and family to your hotel. Keep up the good job!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: Steven V
Reviews.Content: An awesomw hotel that I could find no fault with. The rooms are of good size, the breakfast was OK , check in and out were dealt with quickly and efficiently and the location is unbeatable. We were given a free upgrade to a family suite as we had booked on a triple room sharing basis. The facilities were clean, the service good and well worth every cent. Would we stay there again, YES YES YES

Reviews.Title: “beautiful hotel but rooms disappointing”
Reviews.Author: barbarajohn
Reviews.Content: this hotel was pretty expensive per night the reception staff were lovely but once you get further into the hotel you can see it needs renovating.. beds and pillows were sumptuous.. charges to make tea in own bedroom $3 !!! a bit too far I thought. the breakfast was basic for the western traveller although they did cater for all nationalities, maybe that was a mistake. the dining room staff were a bit abrupt.

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: Asiaexpat81
Reviews.Content: This is not a hotel I would ever choose to stay in myself, but I tagged along with my husband for a recent one-night stay (since we live in Kuala Lumpur) and his secretary booked him into this hotel as it's within walking distance to his branch office. The hotel reminded me of a Mainland China business hotel from the mid-80s, with a few more upgrades. The hotel is in a great location for shopping/being downtown Singapore/Orchard Road, but I would have preferred so many other 4/5 star hotels...this is much closer to what I'd consider a 3-star local business hotel. The lobby was neither cozy nor inviting but it was functional so it is what it is. Checking in took forever (almsot half an hour once my husband was attended to...we had no luggage and he had pre-booked the room--which was guaranteed but somehow not available upon check in; I will give the management credit as we were "upgraded" to a Club room....which did allow for free internet, Club access/breakfast, etc.). My husband booked a smoking room and even his upgrade was on a non-smoking floor (but there was an outdoor balcony (with ashtray--non-smoking room?!). The room, again, was functional but nothing special for the price (then again, all Singapore hotels are outrageous....yet, it was still quite high for the calibre of this hotel). I will say that the duvet and pillows were excellent and inviting (...as good as in any five-star and made sleeping very comfortable. I had the opportunity to settle into the bed for a nap, but it was absolutely impossible (even with earplugs) as it was soooo noisy. Granted, it was 2pm and there is no guarantee of quiet during work hours, but the room was so poorly soundproofed that I could hear absolutely anyone/everyone passing the room, the elevator coming/going, noise from above, and even the vibration of guest room doors opening/shutting. I gave up on the nap.) I decided to do some strolling and had a destination in mind (Club Street/An Xiang Hill area...fabulous little boutiques, restaurants/bars and next to Chinatown...so much fun and I highly recommend this area if you have a couple hours to kill, then drinks/dinner in the area), so I asked the concierge to show me the area on a map. I was quite surprised that they had to look it up and didn't know the area (they did know Chinatown but neither of the streets I mentioned...) but they were kind and found the location efficiently. A huge problem on the other hand, is that the hotel doesn't have a "guest" line for taxis so I had to wait in line with people just coming into the hotel to catch a taxi...I waited for 40 minutes for a taxi (I actually saw two different groups walk in from off the street to get in line while I was still at the concierge)...I highly suggest that the hotel gives their paying guests preference for their taxi queue (easily done with just a couple of signs and showing your room card). The porters were wonderful though and it's such a thankless job to have to keep rushing out to find taxis for hotel guests; kudos to them for their kindness. As for the pool, I looked out at it from the window and it was not inviting. Certainly large enough for swimming but it's located on a rooftop with sterile surroundings; you can get sun on it, but it would not be a place I'd want to curl up with a good book for hours; for the standard of the hotel though, nice enough. One look at the too-basic gym and I decided to wait til I got back home to work out the following day. One look at the breakfast offered in the Club room the next morning, and I decided to wait until my return to Kuala Lumpur to eat (catering more to Asian breakfast cuisine). All in all, sufficiently clean and well located to stay if solely working and in/out of the hotel....not a hotel I'd want to spend any quality holiday time though (but I assume that's not the purpose of the hotel either....great for bus tour groups and business people who just need a clean/adequate room for a few nights).

Reviews.Title: “Home of Shopping, Excellent Internet Service”
Reviews.Author: HotelHopper369
Reviews.Content: I'm an avid shopper by nature. Checking in here was a delight as it was literally the heart of shopping vicinity. The hotel rooms were pretty nice. After a day of shopping, obviously i had to show them off on facebook, the internet service was down initially, as they were doing an upgrade, but i made a call and they mentioned they had a new infrastructure or something. Wireless coverage everywhere inside and out of the room, even the toilet (where i used my ipad for surfing) and then because i was pretty confident, i managed to get some work done because the internet was good. Although cable connections were available as well. Overall pleasant stay. The internet delighted me the most. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “Good Staff, Decent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: khali88
Reviews.Content: Even though I am a local, there is no different when it comes to providing a good service. Staff very friendly and will try their best to make your stay a good one. Room looks a bit tired but its OK. Value for money. Good to have it refurbish.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, Great location”
Reviews.Author: Myloh
Reviews.Content: Check in was fast and easy. Reception staff were falling over themselves to help us the entire time we were there. Taxi doors were opened for us, our bags were taken to our rooms for us, the doors were all opened for us.... 5 star treatment! We requested a universal adaptor which we had to ask one man twice for (which is still great service), but when we asked one of the younger staff for some extra towels he was at our room with the towels no less than 30 seconds after us. Rooftop pool is fantastic, but we were not keen on the idea of the men a few floors up watching our every move. That was the guests though, not the fault of the hotel. The only negative really is that we were charged for a few drinks from the mini bar which we had actually not taken.

Reviews.Title: “orchard Parade quite average”
Reviews.Author: stafamily
Reviews.Content: Stayed 3 times now - connecting rooms were not provided eventhough it was requested each time when booking. Check-in is very slow and receptionist not very welcoming. They should be updating their webside as Gandma's kitchen is now closed and a Chinese restaurant has replaced it. The 2011 Christmas atmospehere was a bit of a let down from previous years. Location is good but facilities and service is pretty average.

Reviews.Title: “singapore trip 2011”
Reviews.Author: 7dragon
Reviews.Content: the hotel is so cosy ,clean , good place to relax. big room. they have a small gym ,and a swimming pool.

Reviews.Title: “Best attribute is the location”
Reviews.Author: gubeana
Reviews.Content: i stayed in orchard parade on a business trip and had an overall pleasing experience. The hotel staff was friendly and accomodating and the lobby area is modern and inviting. The pool is gorgeous and the rooms although small are comfortable and the bed was very plush. Also there is a full size tub (not shower stall) that was a nice surprise. The lobby gives you a feel that the room is going to be a little more modern than it really is. Although you can tell there has been some renovations to modernise the rooms, the old tiles in the bathroom and the water stained walls below the a/c vent gives it away. The rooms are really tiny and from my window, the only view i had was that of the roof of the building next door. The internet is not free and the bathroom was not very well cleaned. Also they were short staffed at the front desk, and it took me forever to check in. But overall, the experience although not amazing, was worth the money spent.

Reviews.Title: “Nice location great staff”
Reviews.Author: JGF_10
Reviews.Content: The staff was friendly and helpful. The location of the hotel was extremely convenient. The staff was extremely acomodating and polite. They went the extra mile to insure thta I felt at home.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: princesslorraine
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed there during our SG trip last June 2011 for our 3rd wedding anniversary. Its location is superb right at the end of Orchard Road! Staff were attentive and courteous. We were given a room beside the pool. Breakfast was just so so. There were only limited variety of food.

Reviews.Title: “Good Stay”
Reviews.Author: GoAust
Reviews.Content: Was there during Christmas, hotel is located around good shopping area. A quick check in. The reception staff sold us a family room. Our booking was for a superior room. This room was much bigger and comfortable. For additional US30 it was worth the money. Nice pool on the 6th floor. Beakfast was not too bad, could do with more western dishes. Nice hotel for family stay.

Reviews.Title: “Poor Quality and room not maintained”
Reviews.Author: Squinch-Joint
Reviews.Content: Stayed here over Christmas 2011. Check-in was a waste of time. Front desk was busy counting money at 11AM and had to wait 10 minutes to get their attention. Joanne gets my vote for most useless staff of the holidays. Didn't eat here as the food was overpriced. First thing in the room I found the carpet wet from a leaking aircon. Called Maintenance and had to spend first hour of my trip in the room baby sitting the room as the door was open for the maintenance to repair the aircon. Total of 1 hour wasted. On my last day, went for breakfast at Mc D's. Came back at 8:45AM and up to my room. Only then did I find that my keycard was invalid. I called front desk and asked why the card was changed? Are they ready to take back my room? Was informed that I had to go all the way back to frontdesk and show them my credit card before they could issue me a new card. Unacceptable. I had no cellphone and no other excuse except they goofed. Perhaps they do this to all their guests. I was happy only 2 times at this hotel. Moment I checked in and moment I got outta there. As I advised the front desk on my way out... NEVER AGAIN FAR EAST. YOU SUCK AT CUSTOMER SERVICE.

Reviews.Title: “Orchard Parade Hotel, Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Nosainthere
Reviews.Content: Stayed on Level 7 - with a pool view. Good location - nearby Orchard MRT station. Reception staff could have been a little more friendly. TV channels were good, however they change up the old TV set. No free Wi-Fi offered in hotel room for hotel guest.

Reviews.Title: “Old hotel”
Reviews.Author: The J
Reviews.Content: This hotels lies in the corner of the tanglin st. Theres a hard rock cafe behind this hotel, and starbuck just in front of the hotel, a mcdonald and wendys justwithin a walking distance. The lobby offer a great smell and nice surrounding. But when up in the alley to the room, its kind a damp smell. No nice view from my room 418. The bathub is kind a small. The room is quite huge. The breakfast selection was not up to standard hotel for 4 stars hotel like in any other countries. Location is fantastic however. But the price is not suit with my expectations.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff- great hotel”
Reviews.Author: ukguytemp
Reviews.Content: The staff at this hotel are outstanding. Nothing is too much trouble for them. I really dont understand why anyone would complain at all. It;s the excellent service here which makes this hotel really great. The location is excellent and the physical decor is good in my book. I would highly recommend this hotel where I have stayed many times. I have stayed in a number of hotels in Singapore and this is the best, my a large margin

Reviews.Title: “***Never have Such poor service & bully !!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Celiashaw
Reviews.Content: Never have such BAD experience in all the hotels around the world!! VERY BAD service, bully & created all the unhappiness due to the bad service and poor management. It is really shock me & my hubby!!!We booked Delux suit room for our wedding day. however it starts the terrible journey at Orchard parade hotel!! -Poor service, staff rude, management UN helpful for customer - no 24 hours house keeping----the staff didn't mention when we check in , even give wrong info as we can call any time to have house keeping - management & staff bully customer -full of lies & blaim on customer. XXXX spoiled my wedding day & our mood!!!!! 1. when check in, there is ladies red stain & long hair on the toilet in master bed room. 2. when check in, we ask for house keeping for next day morning 6-7am, counter staff said can call any time. I call the next day, ppl telling me: NO, don't have!!! how rude it is!!---there is no 24 hrs house keeping, you should high light to customer!!! NOT after give wrong info, then the staff not to help at all. I have to pack the room and toilet by my own on my wedding day!!!--can u image this feeling! I should dress up nicely and doing make up at that moment, take nice photos for my memory, but all these I don't have, as I was busy packing my room!!!photograher was waiting, make up artist was waiting. All these casused the delay that we suppose to leave& return!!! All the while we are very nice and patient to explain to all of the staff there, but they just reject our request very rude. Even they know it's my wedding day!! 3. when we feed back to their management, first time, the manager said it's their fault, as internal mis communication. later on ,they said it because I heard wrongly about the house keeping time. --blaim on customer!!! When on earth got this kind of hotel service???!! 4. the management never do any extra to make us more comfortable after all these unhappies created, just keep eating their promise. 5. so disappoint abt what we experience in this hotel. now I understood why the staff dare to treat customers without patient and honest. 6. management never care abt customer, just let the situation be. 7. we paid, we suffer, we hurt, we painful, they force us to take late check out as return!!- how funny it is!does it can repeat my day, give me my good memories back? 8. this management just rude and form to customer, staff not helpful after give wrong info, just twist and turn to blaim on customer, what hell it is!!! Un believe this is happen in Singapore & 4 star hotel, it never meet the standard, just like black market, everything in dark! Terrible BULLY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! we paid for 4 star hotel rate, even choose the suit room, in the end we get bully, but no one from their management care about this matter!cheated & bully are really make us fed up abt this hotel! will never believe their word again!

Reviews.Title: “great location, a bit dated”
Reviews.Author: gautamver
Reviews.Content: a great location, just at the tip of orchard road, but an old hotel thou well maintained, its due for an update for sure. If there are no newer hotels meeting your budget within this location its a great deal and there is nothing much to complain about. The breakfast buffet is a bit scattered around the large dining room but complete with most options one would expect. Wifi works great. My room had not view at all, with a dead wall about 15 feet away!!

Reviews.Title: “Good place if you aren't the fussy type”
Reviews.Author: clefv3
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a night on a business trip. Right-away I was impressed with the efficiency and service at front desk. Checking in and out were quick and fuss-free. Executive room was good; spacious, seemed newly refurbished, and clean. I especially appreciate the clean bathroom. The Management seemed to have genuinely attended to issues highlighted by previous TA reviewers. However with the price tag, they could have been just a little more generous, by providing two instead of just one bottled water (everywhere in Asia I've always got 2.. until Orchard Parade), and giving two instead of just one shower cap (there must be cases where two females share a room). The air freshener smell in the lobby's waiting area was too strong for me. I found it bothersome while waiting and having my welcome drink and each time I passed the spot. Breakfast was average. There was waterworks renovation scheduled this week. Fortunately I left on the day it began and escaped the noise. The overall experience was good. I don't mind coming back for a *short* stay although it may not be my first choice.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: stevefindlay
Reviews.Content: Not a bad hotel but well positioned at the top of Orchard Rd. I stayed in a Club room on the 17th floor which was fairly well appointed although looking a bit tired and with the smallest bathroom I have ever encountered. The Club lounge was fine although a bit dull and without a decent view. As a lone traveller on business the lounge was not the place to be apart from perhaps for a quick glass of wine in the evening. Breakfast in the club lounge was OK, but nothing to write home about. Pool is a good size and the area is well equipped with plenty of loungers. Ground floor bar area good with nice staff and ipads located on the bar, again to stop the lone traveller from getting too bored. Overall, not a bad hotel at all, well position and reasonably well priced.

Reviews.Title: “Basically OK, needs facelift”
Reviews.Author: joistori
Reviews.Content: I picked Orchard Parade because of its close proximity to the office I did my work at in Singapore. It provided me with what I needed, decent room at a relatively good price (I was on a tight budget), good breakfast and a bar. The hotel is in need of a facelift but for the money paid, I’m quite pleased. You’ll be able to spend all your money on something else in Singapore. The city is not cheap.

Reviews.Title: “Great Balcony”
Reviews.Author: deetwotee
Reviews.Content: The positive point is a great balcony over seeing to the famous Orchard Road from my room at 6th floor.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent family hotel”
Reviews.Author: candymasc
Reviews.Content: Me & my family took a connecting rooms in Hotel Orchard Parade. It is a wonderful hotel. Its quite central, close to the MRT & the bus stop, the hotel by itself was wonderful, staff very helpful & polite, rooms extremely comfortable & clean.There are quite a few malls walking distance. There are also 2-3 good restaurants right outside the hotel. besides there are 2-3 smaller kiosks just 20ms away from the hotel that sell excellent snacks & light meals, besides there also is a 7/11 shop that one can get most essentials. I wud highy recommend this hotel to all families travelling to Singapore. Cant post any photos just yet coz we have just returned and not had the time to load them on the comp.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value and Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: AngelNikki
Reviews.Content: Stayed a week, check-in during the afternoon was easy, quick and they met my needs as I requested for a double or larger size bed and on a non-smoking floor. The room was showing it's age but it was clean and comfortable, size was nice with a view overlooking the pool area. The staff at the Front Desk was courteous and polite. In fact I was having a hard time getting my cell phone to work and the concierge had me leave it with him and he tried to fix it for me. I can't say enough about the hotel and staff and would highly recommend anyone to stay there, location was great too.

Reviews.Title: “Good value and location”
Reviews.Author: honjar18
Reviews.Content: Good location on Orchard Road, 5 minutes from transit stop. Priced somewhat less than other hotels in area in high priced Singapore. Friendly staff; decent restaurants on premises.

Reviews.Title: “Good for lonely guys”
Reviews.Author: chinaman_11
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located in the opposite of Orchard Towers and at the end of Orchard Road. If you want to stay for a shopping visit with your girlfriend, choose the other end of Orchard Road. Anyway, shopping malls are very close and Orchard MRT station as well. Room size was okay, unfortunately, my room was located above the air-condition outlet. The balcony door didn't closed correctly, therefore it was very noisy in the room. Overall, the rooms need a renovation, as everything looks very oldfashioned. TV is still an small, old modell, with only few programmes in bad quality.

Reviews.Title: “Good stay”
Reviews.Author: Happylocal2011
Reviews.Content: Stayed over the weekend. Nice n clean rooms. Staffs are friendly. Nice hotel

Reviews.Title: “Would benefit from Updating”
Reviews.Author: Shuggy66
Reviews.Content: I stayed one night here with two colleagues who felt them same as me about it. It needs updating a bit but other wise comfortable and good service. It felt over priced to me but that was probably as I say it needs updating - decor a bit tired. In particular the bathrooms let it down with a tired look and feel, needs a refit. The shower was overhead in the bath with a shower curtain; never appealing. The anti slip grit texture of the bath base gave it a rather well used and unclean feeling. Nice spacious room, ample sockets and comfortable beds. A nice tranquil feeling on arrival in the lobby. Good location. Cannot comment on any facilities or restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Gone downhill”
Reviews.Author: xmroots
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for one night several years ago and thought that it was not too bad, not as good as the Orchard Hotel on the other side of the road, my usual hotel in Singapore, but not bad nevertheless. What a change I have found this visit. I was given a family room which was huge but showing its age and not particularly clean, it was also very "cold" and unwelcoming. After two delayed flights I arrived in the middle of the evening and having arrived in my room I decided I would like a sandwich and drink before bed. Room service informed me that it was not possible to get a sandwich after 6pm, all I could have was a meal. There was no moving them on this and I wnded up oredring one of their pizzza's. Now the room service menu is rather grandly written - Pizza Amateciana, tomato, cheese, pork bacon and onions. What arrived was a burnt pizza base with some sticky orange "stuff" on top. No sign of any pork bacon or horse bacon for that matter, the only thing that could be recognised was a few pieces of onion. Lunch the next day I tried the Sandwich Al Cotto E Formaggio which it turned out consisted of two slices of plastic white bread containing a slice of plastic American cheese and a slice of plastic ham. Absolutely appalling by Singapore standards. The front desk staff were helpful at check-in and out but boy has this place gone to the dogs and I would recommend that if you can you go somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Affordable 4 star considering it is Singapore”
Reviews.Author: mimima
Reviews.Content: Expat living in Singapore, put up my mom here for a week during her visit. Singapore has very high hotel cost, with 4,5 star being very expensive (compared to rest of SEA). 3 star hotels become relatively cheaper but with it comes the downgrade in space, location, service etc. In other words, the diffrence between 3 and 4 star is a huge gap. For visitors who will rely on public transport and need esy access to shops and attractions, (and dont want to pay the price of Hyatt, Hilton, Marriott etc) Orchard Parade is a reasonable option. Service is nothing to rave about but Singapore is not known for great customer service. Had to exchange card keys 4 times, room was not properly made several times. Upon bringing this up to house keeping, it was fixed immediately. Make sure you ask for a room away from the renovation construction. Overall, i would say a 4 star hotel with a 3 star service with.

Reviews.Title: “Only for the location...”
Reviews.Author: minerva32
Reviews.Content: I had stayed at this hotel before it became "A far east hotel" and really liked it... That's why we picked this hotel again for our summer visit to Singapore. Unfortunately, many things have changed since it become the member of Far East Group Hotels. First of all, the staff are not as polite and helpfull anymore, the rooms are not clean enough and very tired looking but the worst of all was the "buffet" breakfast!!! Believe me, I had seen better continental breakfasts than this "buffet"!!! I don't know about the Asian food but there was absolutely nothing to eat for Westerns! They are so strict about the breakfast coupons, even charge 5 years old kids but won't even offer anything for the kids at all!!! It's much better getting a room without breakfast and having breakfast at the "coffee bean and tea leaf" next to the hotel. Or, you can have good coffee and pastries at starbucks, downstairs. The pool is nice but no service around the pool. The Grandma's Restaurant at the lobby is great for dinners.The food is delicious, service is fast and the prices are very reasonable. The best thing about this hotel is the location. You will be just on Orchard Rd., you can easily reach all the main shops and their food courts in a few minutes walk. The taxi ride from airport to the hotel coasts less than 20 SGD. So, if you don't expect much and have breakfast outside, you'll be OK staying there...

Reviews.Title: “Good Location....but would not stay again”
Reviews.Author: Dmcwaters
Reviews.Content: Given wrong room without balcony, helpful porter arranged the change with no fuss. Good location on the corner of Tanglin Rd and Orchard, bus stop across road and MRT station less than 1km away. Front desk staff were less than helpful, each telling us different buses to catch to certain places. No free wifi in the whole hotel which made our stay difficult when the staff couldn't help us on where to go. Lan & wifi cost in 15 min increments. Bathroom grout and tiles, dirty and breaking. Bed linen very nice

Reviews.Title: “Convinient and reasonable hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bugles
Reviews.Content: The hotel is not the best hotel in town but for sure is extremely convinient and service was apt. The product is a bit old now however I had no regrets for the value for money at the hotels. Cant comment on F&B as orchard road is just next door and enough good options to eat close by.

Reviews.Title: “Good location but need improvement on tidiness”
Reviews.Author: ajghazali
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 3 days 2 nights for a family holiday. Place is convenient for shopping along Orchard Road. Rooms were OK in terms of space and cleanliness but the passage to my room was not properly kept. It was located at the end and we had to pass infront of service lift and old newspapers, boxes were left there and it was just beside my room. Otherwise the place should be OK. One setback - no free wifi at lobby. Grandma's Restaurant offers reasonable Peranakan Nyonya food. The TV reception was not so clear - not sure why. Staff were friendly and flexible and willing to accommodate our request. For breakfast just walk outside and you will find Starbucks and Coffee Bean. Shopping wise you have many choices and depending on your budget.

Reviews.Title: “Very handy location but the hotel is showing it's age”
Reviews.Author: Lee_thal77
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for an overnight stop over recently with my family. We had an initial problem with our booking were we were given a family room with 3 single beds for 5 people even though I had emailed ahead of time with our requirements. The problem was sorted out relatively quickly and the correct room we had was a good size but the floor plan was still very open which wasn't ideal trying to get young children to sleep. The location of the hotel itself is fantastic and the close by facilities are very handy. The fit out of the hotel room itself is a bit dated which is a bit of a letdown since the price of a room wasn't exactly cheap. One thing that was disappointing was the traffic noise, granted the hotel is on a busy road but we were on the 3rd floor and it sounded like we were next to the footpath.

Reviews.Title: “Well maintained old hotel with great location”
Reviews.Author: bubblybenji
Reviews.Content: First, the location is great compared to its value of money. Walkable distance to MRT and bus stop just in front. Close to delicious foods and Orchard shopping centre. The hotel itself is old, but still well-maintained, with professional staff. Check in early without any trouble or fuss. The room is nice also, with balcony.. my room was at the 6th floor, the same floor as the swimming pool. So from the balcony, only steps away to the swimming pool to swim or just to relax on the side of it. The room is clean, and quite spacious.. there's a sofa and coffe table besides the bed. The one thing I dont like is during night, some "girls" are hanging out near the hotel (notice there's orchard tower very nearby). But as long as we dont disturb them, they wont disturb us :)

Reviews.Title: “Location location location”
Reviews.Author: indodanny
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in this hotel dozens of times on business trips. This was the first time with my family. Staff has become more friendly over the last couple of years. Traveling with a baby and a 13 year old is not always evident. But in this hotel no problem. Extra beds fit in the room and are very affordable compared to many other hotels in Singapore. Let alone that in most hotels in Singapore there is not enough space in the rooms to fit in an extra bed for your kids. Price is reasonable. Location is great. Downstairs you got Starbucks, Modesto's and... probably the best american steak place in Singapore, Black Angus... and chinese and japanese...and.... you are on Orchard Road...(eventhough the hotel's address is Tanglin Road 1, it is actually on Orchard). Great place, comfortable rooms, friendly staff and right price. And.... Location location location..... Enjoy....!!!

Reviews.Title: “It was great and we will be back!”
Reviews.Author: BabarMalik
Reviews.Content: We stayed for a week at the Orchard Parade Hotel in their family suite. The hotel was great and we faced no problems. The room was good and well maintained and the staff was very polite and helpful. The breakfast buffet was good and my kids loved it. Location of the hotel is convieneant. I would not hesitate to recommend the hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed for the 4th Time.”
Reviews.Author: frequentnomad
Reviews.Content: My company has an office just down the road so they put many of us up at the OPH. Each time I stay here there are issues, and they are typically not resolved. The last time I stayed, 3 things in the room did not work (tv, hair dryer, and the tub did not drain), I let the concierge know before I left for work in the morning, and upon returning late that night discovered nothing had been fixed. This time I was booked into an "executive room" which includes airport transfer. I wandered around looking for the driver for 15 minutes and decided not to waste any more time, so went by taxi. At least they reimbursed my taxi fare. On an a different occasion I arrived at the hotel quite late at night (1 am) and there was nobody to help with bags and it took quite some time to even find someone to check me in. Literally every single time I stay there there are problems with service and/or the room. If this hotel was in a cheaper price range I would have zero complaints, because I would expect some issues at a 3 star place. But, you can stay at the Shangri La for just a few dollars more. So why bother with the OPH? My company has had so many complaints from us that they are going to stop using the OPH. I will say this - the rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable. The bathrooms are tiny and worn but are not dirty. The location is great if you want proximity to Orchard Road, and it's nice having a Starbucks just outside. The gym is nothing to speak of, the pool looks nice though I've never used it. Breakfast is average, nothing to write home about but not awful either. However, for $20 more I'd prefer to stay at a proper 5 star with great service, a great room and better facilities. So, bye bye OPH, this is the last time I'll be staying with you!

Reviews.Title: “the wi-fi connection sucks!"”
Reviews.Author: Apolei1029
Reviews.Content: been trying to connect in the hotel's wi-fi connection but to no avail. staff are not that helpful and accommodating.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and friendly staff, we would stay again”
Reviews.Author: Jodes79
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Orchard Parade in June 2011 with our 3 year old and one year old. Upon arrival we were upgraded free of charge to an executive room with a king size bed (ample room for the whole family....which is lucky as that's the way it ended up!). We were also provided with a cot and a single bed but had the single bed taken out as we really didn't need it and preferred to have the extra space to move around (with the cot and single bed, we wouldn't have been able to move). The hotel is clean, friendly and well located. We will definetely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “hotel at a prime location”
Reviews.Author: joseph37
Reviews.Content: Situated at the prime area this hotel is situated in the most happening place of Singapore. Just besides is a starbucks coffee outlet for you to spend some time. The street across is bustling with commercial activities and there is an Indian restaurant near the hotel if not mistaken it is the woodlands outlet. Again between the hotel and the Indian restaurant is a foot spa one would like to visit. The hotel itself has package tours which one can choose as ones requirement. Nightclub just across the hotel for those who enjoy the nightlife. The gym is nicely equipped and is near the swimming pool so one can enjoy both simultaneously. The breakfast spread is also very nice. Being a busy hotel you would find taxis coming in very often for your city trips. Hotel Orchard parade is near to all the major atrractions of Singapore. The building across the hotel in the basement has a small joint which will offer you excellent tea Indian style. This building will also have spas and other local eatery joints.

Reviews.Title: “We simply loved the Hotel and will surely stay next time.”
Reviews.Author: reza1969
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the hotel for 5 nights with my family and were overjoyed. The rooms were decorated and beds were amazing. The bathrooms inspite of being small was well organized and my 2 children never had any problem except that there was no health fossit attached in the toilet. The reception and the other room service people were very cooperative . The location of the hotel is best to see singapore shopping area where most of the mall was a walking distance. We listened to the street singer quite late in the night next to the hotel . The swimming pool was good for the children to swim as well. The breakfast on the first day was amazing, second day was also good but the same set of food, but the 3rd, 4th & 5th day same set of breakfast was quite unbelievebale for the kind of hotel it is. Felt that there was a need to put some more staff to service so many guest coming in during breakfast as the staff were not courtous enough when ask for something as they were too busy handling many guests. I was also happy to receive the gifts from the hotel on my birthday which was really a nice gesture.

Reviews.Title: “Location does not make up for lack of quality service.”
Reviews.Author: WickedWitchoftheWest
Reviews.Content: Friends who have previously stayed at this hotel had good things to say so we decided to try it. I will not go into specifics, but this is probably the worst service I have experienced in any of my hotel stays, 3-star hotels included. The receptionists are slow, almost inattentive and borderline rude. No one is on stand-by at the concierge area, so if one is seeking immediate assistance, it's very unlikely that you will get any. While the rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable, the excellent location does not make up for lack of quality service. There are better, and probably cheaper hotels in the area, and at the current rate they are charging, might as well stay at a 5-star hotel where you will most likely get the service you pay for.

Reviews.Title: “If it is Singapore with family it has to be Orchard Parade”
Reviews.Author: sunilsrivastava
Reviews.Content: I stayed with my wife and son (13) for 5 days at the hotel. We had booked a superior triple room with an extra bed for my son. The room was well furnished (though could do with a few more shelves in the wardrobe) but the King Size bed for large and could sleep all three of us comfortably. The staff was professional and friendly. The breakfast spread was good but they can add a bit f variety to the menu. It can become a bit boring to have the same spread daily for 5 days.

Reviews.Title: “The comfort of home."”
Reviews.Author: mbe_thaiwah
Reviews.Content: The hotel was old and was not as appealing as other hotels along the Orchard Road. Still, we felt the comfort of home staying in that hotel. The area was rather quiet despite the fact that it situated right at the corner of Tanglin and Orchard Road which is the busiest shopping street in Singapore. Our room was nice and had enough space for everyone of us (there were five of us in that room.) We would say we found value for our money spent on the room at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: Cameron0042
Reviews.Content: I didn't stay in the Orchard Parade Hotel, however I had friends who did, one of whom was celebrating their sixtieth birthday during their stay. I made arrangements with the concierge to send a bouquet of flowers to their room.; not only did they send a beautiful arrangement, they also delivered a bottle of wine and chocolates compliments of the hotel! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “good hotel near Orchard Road”
Reviews.Author: PhilippineTraveller
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Orchard Parade hotel for 4 days. Location is good, at the point where Orchard Road begins (or ends of course). Orchard Road is the main shopping street where you can find big malls, other hotels (Hilton, Marriott) and some clubs (Orchard Tower). More bars and restaurants can be found at Boat Quay and Clarke Quay. A very international place where people from all over the world come to for work or holiday. You should have no problem to connect with others. Lot of interesting places you can visit (ask in hotel). Hotel has nice big rooms though my room had a rather small bathroom. Internet in the room is not free, You can get an upgrade at the hotel which gives you free internet, breakfast, 1 free drink per day at the lobby bar and free laundry (2 pieces per day though only). In the hotel are several restaurants and just around the corner (to the left when you walk out of the hotel) is a sushi bar (Akashi), not cheap (hé, nothing is in Singapore) but great sushi, sashimi, beef etc. If you like this kind of food it's a place you must go. Now Singapore also has 2 casino's but beware, entrance will cost you S$ 100,- (US$ 80 or € 55) for 24 hours. Overall Singapore is a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Good space and close to Orchard Road.”
Reviews.Author: eirianto
Reviews.Content: The room and hotel was generally fine and big enough, still enough space if must be add extra bed. I was there two times, and exciting.

Reviews.Title: “Solid hotel, 5 star service”
Reviews.Author: jcn_uk
Reviews.Content: I visit Singapore every year, around the time of my anniversary. We always stay at the Parade. The location is just perfect: Orchard road is at your doorstep, if you want the crowds and the shopping. But if you want to stretch your legs walking through some ultra-elegant and quite roads, turn your back to Orchard, and explore Taglin Road, Napier Road, the Botanic Garden, Nassim Hill. The Parade is a very honest 4 star hotel. It offers you good rooms, a nice pool, three different restaurants (all reasonable priced for Singapore), and excellent service. Aware of my 25th anniversary, the reception staff upgraded us to a very large suite, sent us a fruit basket, and complimented us at every opportunity. Small gestures that add up, and show that they understand how to run a hotel. My only complaint is the price of the internet access: broadband costs are so low now, that charging for it (and a hefty SGD 5 for ½ hour) feels wrong.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, average hotel”
Reviews.Author: savi_1705
Reviews.Content: We had no trouble checking in it was smooth. But when we entered our room and looked out for the view, we could only see the wall of another bldg. ! Room was ok . Bathrooms shady - too small . We saw one lizard too at night in our room ... So overall it was very average. Expensive hotel for the kind of services rendered .

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was ok - But watch out for the hotel/taxi scam”
Reviews.Author: dreamchaser8
Reviews.Content: Stayed here recently and there is a scam going where instead of getting a nomal metered taxi that you can find all over Singapore they have alot of taxi's that come through where the charges on their "metered taxis" are excessive or you will get taxis driving you to the airport with a "fixed" price to the airport. having been to Singapore many times I refused to pay. Example 1. A taxi trip from hotel to Clarke Quay was going to cost me $20 Sing until i confronted the taxi driver and he pretended to act dumb when the real cost should be closer to $6. Catching a taxi from the hotel to the airport the txi driver tried to charge me a fixed fee of $30. I told the taxi driver where to get off. I suspect there is a commission or money under the table deal going on with some of the hotel porters which may go higher up the management chain and the taxi drivers to rip off unsuspecting guests staying at the hotel. I have never experienced this at ANY other hotel in Singapore except for Orchade Parade hotel so please be careful.I wont be staying at this hotel again

Reviews.Title: “Good location and standard Singapore hotel”
Reviews.Author: Linnilon
Reviews.Content: We were lucky to be upgraded to the exec floor as they couldn't offer us a king sized bed that we'd paid for. The rooms are quite basic but the staff were friendly and effecient and it was great to be able to use the exec lounge. I think anyone can upgrade to this for around £50 which is worth it if you like a couple of pre-dinner drinks as they're complementary during early evening. The staff there were very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Not the best but still very good”
Reviews.Author: jpclements
Reviews.Content: Overall this was a very good hotel for a couple of nights on business. It is well located at one end of Orchard Rd (the main retail st) and had reasonably good facilities. Rooms were a decent size and each room had a balcony which is always handy to get away from the constant air con. The hotel had a decent pool but in the gym half of the equipment did not work. Overall not much to say - it was a very typical 4 star hotel and I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay”
Reviews.Author: SGG9201
Reviews.Content: Very clean and cosy. Stay at Orchard Parade with my family for the weekend . My children just love the place. Service is excellence and the room is very clean. Housekeeping staff at level 11 is very friendly. She is from China but now a Singaporean citizen.

Reviews.Title: “Not worth it”
Reviews.Author: maxgeorge1903
Reviews.Content: Not a particularly pleasant place to stay; the place is gloomy. I made the mistake of asking the Tour desk a question and when she realized it wasn't about buying a tour, she was notably unpleasant. I wouldn't stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, average hotel”
Reviews.Author: hattomhen
Reviews.Content: Booked to stay here for 2 nights as 2 adults and 3 children. The room was actually fairly good but the rest of the hotel is not so good. The smell in the corridors is really bad, a very strong damp smell. The breakfast is very poor not a great choice and staff were not the most helpful either in the restaurant or anywhere else in the hotel. To sum up just very average, the best thing was the location...

Reviews.Title: “Great location, Clean Hotel, Efficient service”
Reviews.Author: elizas
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on two occasions, first around Christmas & again 10 days later & was very pleased with the hotel.Both times we were on the 16th floor. Room 1619 was enormous, had two balconies, a lounge setting,huge bathroom & small setting on one of the balconies. Our other room was smaller with one balcony. The best thing about the bathrooms sre the large shower heads. In a hot & humid place like Singapore this made showering a luxurious experience. Rooms & hotel was very clean & the towels, bathrobes & slippers were thick & soft. Location was perfect. Food for all tastes & budgets was walking distance. If you are looking for local food there's a great little food court across the road opposite from Macdonalds in the basement. There you will find simillar food as Grandmas for a fraction of the price. The only things that could have improved our stay would have been free WIFi & the tour desk operator. The tour desk didn't have much information & left a note to say he was going to be back at 1.30pm when he went to lunch but I don;t think he came back at all that afternoon. Aside from that we would definitely stay at Orchard Parade again & would recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Krongtong
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel for 2 nights(1 Jan-3Jan 2011) Staffs were courtesy and helpful. We moved from another hotel but we had to go to universal in the early morning so we asked for early check in before we went to universal . They were willing to do that for us and let us keep our luggage with them till we came back in the evening. The hotel room was superb and exellent. The bathroom was clean and cosy. Good location of the hotel even a bit walking distance to the MRT station.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, poor hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Sammy0585
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 1 night before flying out of Singapore. Room had a window, but the view was of another wall, less than a foot away. Decor dated. Bed quality was ok. Bathroom tired and tatty. Restaurants below the hotel were good, starbucks there too and only a short walk from the delights of orchard road. Usually stay at the Orchard hotel across the street, but had to stay here as they were fully booked. Will not be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Just nice”
Reviews.Author: Torben H
Reviews.Content: I have just stayed two weeks at this hotel, and it was really nice. First at the secondary building later at the main building, where I did get a upgrade for free due to my regular stay at this hotel. I can recomend this hotel

Reviews.Title: “old hotel”
Reviews.Author: ilovehkg
Reviews.Content: got disappointed when i entered the bathroom, the fixtures are old, and oh the towels, there were old with loose/hanging threads; the lighting is dim, cant see clearly doing my makeup, breakfast was not good. With the price I paid, i expected it to be a 3 or 4-star hotel as it stated. not recommended at all.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel moderately-priced with value for money”
Reviews.Author: Federal_Territory
Reviews.Content: Conveniently located at the start of Orchard Road. About 10 minutes walk to ION and MRT. Courteous and friendly staff. Room service and housekeeping comparatively above par. Nice oriental & international buffet breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Has potential”
Reviews.Author: MissBrisbane
Reviews.Content: Check In and Check Out was quick and easy. The room was pleasant enough, always was very quiet and I'm a light sleeper and was never woken by any noise. Bathrooms are on the small side but still nice enough and the tv had plenty of channels available. My room was cleaned each day by housekeeping but i never ordered room service so can't comment on that. The bar in the lobby..don't bother, they don't know how to even make most things and you can wait for up to half an hour just for a drink. The italian and steak restaurants were terrible I thought, however Tung Lok was great, they really know good service there and maybe need to show the other restaurants how it's done. The toilets in the lobby were gross and needed a desperate clean, the smell was bad also. The breakfast I thought was great, plenty of variety and except for the last day of my stay there was always plenty available, the last day for some reason they couldn't keep up with the demand of people and lots of food was unavailable. It's so close to all the shops and plenty of food places, I recommend hard rock cafe and california pizza. You honestly can't beat the location.

Reviews.Title: “Nice”
Reviews.Author: canadiann0mad
Reviews.Content: A good hotel - nice that our company was paying for it as we wouldn't be paying that much on our own. Good breakfast, great location right on Orchard. If you've got the money it'd be a good choice.

Reviews.Title: “First bad surprise in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: svdrozd
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Orchad Parade in July. Could not get room in our favourite hotels (Mandarin Mauritus, Park Royal on Beach Road). Our club room was fine, bathroom was old and in great need to be CLEAN ! Bath tab and shower curtain was really looking dirty and heavily used. In room we got visitors - ants. Carpets in room and corridor were smelly and quite old too. Our child developed some allergy to that. Breakfast was good and staff in dining area was extremely helpful and polite. Front desk of this hotels surpised and dissapointed us a lot. Ms.ELLA was the first (and i hope last) Singaporian who was EXTREMELY UNFRIENDLY and UNHELPFUL, forget about smile . Ms Ella gave me a lesson "don't experiment with new hotels, stick to known"

Reviews.Title: “Good location, but very noisy”
Reviews.Author: Lukasw31
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located at the end of Orchard road, close to shopping malls but also in a walking distance from the botanic garten. Unterground (MRT) station of NS line is also 5 minutes to walk. Rooms in the hotel (I change two of them) were very loud, at least if they have a view opposite to the main entrance of the hotel. The noice came from (probably) large air conditioner outside of the hotel. A view on the third floor was directly to a multy-story car park. The air conditioner in the room was also very noisy, but sleeping with open window was not possible due to noise from outside. The furniture in the hotel was functional, but pretty old. For the price, it is possible to get a much better room in Singapore, but not on fancy location as Orchard road.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing fancy - but a good choice”
Reviews.Author: Globaladventure
Reviews.Content: This is a good hotel and wont break the bank compared to many other options in the area. The rooms are roomy and comfortable. The only let down is the bathroom, which is a bit small. There is a nice pool and small, well equipped gym. The real plus is the choice of restaurants - you have a good Steak Restaurant, Italian, Malaysian, Japanese and even a Starbucks. With all the choice - the main disappointment is breakfast - which is very poor (pop out to Starbucks instead). I had an Executive Package - which also included a free airport transfer, laundry, internet and mini bar - which added to the value for money. Staff are friendly, but not forthcoming in service.

Reviews.Title: “My Hotel of choice in Singapore, Great Central Location”
Reviews.Author: paulsmithun
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at this hotel for around 15 years. They continually have top class food outlets. Grandmas’ offers great local food and then one of the best steaks in town at the Black Angus or great modern Italian at Modestos. Rooms are comfortable and spacious and the Club benefits package is well worth the upgrade. It includes breakfast on the 17th floor, tea and coffees during the day, complimentary drinks from 6pm - 8pm, free internet and a couple of pieces of laundry each day. Large swimming pool with all day sun right in the heart of the CBD. Located at the start of Orchard Parade, near the Hard Rock Cafe and dozens of other restaurants, clubs and bars. Only a 5 minute walk from the Royal Thai Embassy or Hilton Hotel and the Isetan shopping mall another few minutes away. Top location, top hotel and some of the most efficient staff I have experienced in 20 years of business and leisure travel. My hotel of choice in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “location and facilities have always been excellent.”
Reviews.Author: kitty033
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here a number of times in recent years, on two occasions with a group of 16-20 secondary students on a study tour. They have had no complaints at all about the Orchard Parade and I had a fantastic room when we last stayed there in September 2009. We are planning to return with another school group in April 2011 and I am planning to stay there again with my husband for a weekend in September 2010 en route back to Australia. I have read recent reviews and I do hope that those who gave the Orchard Parade less than favourable reviews were maybe just unlucky? It would be a real pity if things have changed because we have to be certain that all is as it should be if we are supervising a large number of students. I have noticed however, that the rates seem to be higher than I expected and I can't seem to find a good deal for a weekend stay which includes breakfast, so I am really hoping that it will still be an option. I am looking forward to going to the hairdresser at the hotel for a sensational Singapore shampoo. The location is perfect and it is definitely interesting at night.

Reviews.Title: “The best value you'll find on Orchard Road.”
Reviews.Author: chookchookflea
Reviews.Content: It's not easy to find a decent hotel in this part of Singapore unless you shell out most of your travel budget. However, Orchard Parade is highly recommended for both price and quality. Best of all, the hotel is situated in the swankiest part of town so it's only a short walk to all the malls and restaurants. Other reviewers have mentioned their disdain at being so near the infamous Orchard Towers (where many of Singapore's hookers lurk), but they didn't bother us and actually made for some interesting people-watching sessions by nightfall! Orchard Parade also checked off all the other essential boxes: our room was clean, had an extremely comfortable king-sized bed, and was pretty spacious. Our only complaint about it was the bathroom. Though fully functional and spotless, it was on the small side. Another minor issue was with one slightly haughty receptionist named Cella. I don't know if she was simply having a bad day, but she was beyond grumpy when we went to ask her a few questions. She spoke to us impatiently as if she had better things to do than talk to paying customers. If she's always like this then she should probably rethink working in the service industry. All in all, Orchard Parade is an excellent, value-for-money hotel and we will be staying here again when we come back to Singapore.
